name: Breastplate of Bloodthirst
tooltip:
Breastplate of BloodthirstLevel 60

In order to create the Breastplate of Bloodthirst, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Skin of Shadow.

You will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

Requirements:
- Pristine Hide of the Beast
- Frayed Abomination Stitching x 10
- Arcanite Bar x 5
- Skin of Shadow x 5
- Money:50
